sp_instance.title: Welcome
sp_instance.widget_parameters:
{ "html": { "value": "

Shout Out an Individual

Easily show your appreciation to a team member by sending a virtual high five through our recognition platform. Tell us why the employee has exceeded expectations and how their efforts align with an I&MT key result. Your recognition will be sent directly to the employee and their manager as well as be publicly displayed in the Recognition Board.

Redeem Recognitions for Points

Both nominator and nominee will receive points which can be redeemed for various experiences and prizes.

  • Nominees receive 5 Points
  • Nominators receive 1 Point
", "displayValue": "
